nodes.text: R4-T1 was an R4-series astromech droid in the service of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars.
R4-T1 was one of the more basic R4 astromechs on the market, but still considered to be one of the most reliable.
R4-T1 was a pet droid which was made available for the in-game marketplace of Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures in December, 2013 for the price of 4,999 Republic Credits.
